liblinebreak Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
LineBreakPropertiesStruct for entries of line break properties
LineBreakPropertiesIndexStruct for the second-level index to the line breaking properties
LineBreakPropertiesLangStruct for association of language-specific line breaking properties with language names
